description:
A chocobo is an adventurer's best friend!

With the new Buddy System, you can take a chocobo buddy with you on your adventure. 
Invite Thief and begin your journey now!

[Ability]
Alert：Use a cunning Thief's technique to reveal a floor map featuring the location of enemies, traps, and items.
name: Buddy Chocobo “Thief”
